name: Rect
description: The Rect class is a rendering component in JSMacros that represents a colored rectangle that can be drawn on the screen.
overview: The Rect class provides a flexible way to draw rectangles with various properties including customizable position and dimensions, full color support with alpha transparency, rotation capabilities, Z-index layering, parent-child relationships, and alignment utilities.

constructors.signature: new Rect(x1, y1, x2, y2, color, rotation, zIndex)
constructors.description: Creates a new Rect with specified coordinates, color, rotation, and z-index.

parameters.name: x1
parameters.description: X coordinate of the first corner

parameters.name: y1
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the first corner

parameters.name: x2
parameters.description: X coordinate of the second corner

parameters.name: y2
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the second corner

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: Color in RGB format (alpha will be set to 0xFF)

parameters.name: zIndex
parameters.description: Z-index for rendering order (higher values render on top)

constructors.signature: new Rect(x1, y1, x2, y2, color, alpha, rotation, zIndex)
constructors.description: Creates a new Rect with specified coordinates, color, alpha, rotation, and z-index.

parameters.name: x1
parameters.description: X coordinate of the first corner

parameters.name: y1
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the first corner

parameters.name: x2
parameters.description: X coordinate of the second corner

parameters.name: y2
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the second corner

methods.name: setX1
methods.description: Sets the X coordinate of the first corner.

methods.name: getX1
methods.description: Returns the X coordinate of the first corner.

methods.name: setY1
methods.description: Sets the Y coordinate of the first corner.

methods.name: getY1
methods.description: Returns the Y coordinate of the first corner.

methods.name: setPos1
methods.description: Sets both coordinates of the first corner.

methods.name: setX2
methods.description: Sets the X coordinate of the second corner.

methods.name: getX2
methods.description: Returns the X coordinate of the second corner.

methods.name: setY2
methods.description: Sets the Y coordinate of the second corner.

methods.name: getY2
methods.description: Returns the Y coordinate of the second corner.

methods.name: setPos2
methods.description: Sets both coordinates of the second corner.

methods.name: setPos
methods.description: Sets all rectangle coordinates at once.

parameters.name: x1
parameters.description: X coordinate of the first corner

parameters.name: y1
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the first corner

parameters.name: x2
parameters.description: X coordinate of the second corner

parameters.name: y2
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the second corner

methods.name: setWidth
methods.description: Sets the width of the rectangle. Preserves the position of the corner with the smaller X coordinate.

methods.name: getWidth
methods.description: Returns the current width of the rectangle.

methods.name: setHeight
methods.description: Sets the height of the rectangle. Preserves the position of the corner with the smaller Y coordinate.

methods.name: getHeight
methods.description: Returns the current height of the rectangle.

methods.name: setSize
methods.description: Sets both width and height at once.

methods.name: setColor
methods.description: Sets the color with full alpha (0xFF).

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: Color in RGB format (e.g., 0xFF0000 for red)

methods.name: setColor
methods.description: Sets both color and alpha values.

methods.name: setAlpha
methods.description: Sets only the alpha transparency value.

methods.name: getColor
methods.description: Returns the current color value (including alpha).

methods.name: getAlpha
methods.description: Returns only the alpha component of the color.

methods.name: setRotation
methods.description: Sets the rotation angle of the rectangle.

parameters.name: rotation
parameters.description: Rotation angle in degrees (clockwise, will be wrapped to 0-360)

methods.name: getRotation
methods.description: Returns the current rotation angle.

methods.name: setRotateCenter
methods.description: Sets whether the rectangle should rotate around its center point.

parameters.name: rotateCenter
parameters.description: true to rotate around center, false to rotate around origin

methods.name: isRotatingCenter
methods.description: Returns whether the rectangle is set to rotate around its center.

methods.name: setZIndex
methods.description: Sets the z-index for rendering order.

parameters.name: zIndex
parameters.description: Z-index value (higher values render on top)

methods.name: getZIndex
methods.description: Returns the current z-index.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the rectangle. This method is called automatically when the rectangle is added to a 2D drawing surface.

methods.name: setParent
methods.description: Sets the parent drawing surface for this rectangle.

methods.name: getScaledWidth
methods.description: Returns the scaled width of the rectangle.

methods.name: getParentWidth
methods.description: Returns the width of the parent drawing surface.

methods.name: getScaledHeight
methods.description: Returns the scaled height of the rectangle.

methods.name: getParentHeight
methods.description: Returns the height of the parent drawing surface.

methods.name: getScaledLeft
methods.description: Returns the left edge position (minimum X coordinate).

methods.name: getScaledTop
methods.description: Returns the top edge position (minimum Y coordinate).

methods.name: moveTo
methods.description: Moves the rectangle to the specified position while maintaining its size.
